channel.title: [Delta]Xenophobia - Putting PK back to servers
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/3568/52246816.png[/img][/center]
[hr]
[size=24pt][shadow=red,left][u][b]Team[/b][/u][/shadow][/size]
ox random xi
Arham 4 (me)
[hr]
[size=24pt][shadow=red,left][u][b]Supporters[/b][/u][/shadow][/size]
RandQm <3 g0d of war1 <3 Mopar Coder lover854 runewings317 <3 DannyC omarsoliman <3 Tutorial <3 ottkid2 chillwitm888 <3
[hr]
If moderator will please allow:
Website: Soon... Forums: http://xenophobia317.site88.net/index.php
Our server is named Xenophobia and ox random xi is planning to host it. I love his idea, so we plan to make it to life!
[center][code=Needed] ############################################################### # Still needed: 1 - Store prices. # # add player management forum and report player/staff forum. # # here it is, 1st draft. will make edits when needed - andrew # ############################################################### ---- Xenophobia ---- *24/7 PK server.* 1. Server: a. Home: Miscellania. b. Inside the "castle area" is no pk zone. Shops are located here. c. No teleporting anywhere. d. Start at max level - 99 attack / strenght/ defence / prayer / magic / range. e. No real player commands - minimal is better. 2. Money. Gold. Try to have a stable economy. a. When a player dies, it drops 1-10k (randomly). b. No items are lost when a player dies - "fun pk" everywhere. 3. Shops // these will be edited probably, this is 1st draft. a. Equipment shop: I. Monk Robes. II. Ghastly Rhobes. III. Iron/Steel/Mith/Addy/Rune/Dragon V. Capes. // talk about this later ***** VI. Amulets: Glory/Strength/ect. // all amulets that help you combat.
b. Ranging shop: I. All arrows, 100M in stock. II. All bows, from good to bad to crystal. III. Ranging gear: ranging hat/boots/amululets. V. Ranging armor: All D'Hide. From green to snake to black. C. Food Shop: I. Lobsters and shark. High amounts, never run out. D. Pots: I. All pots (4) included. Any pot that would be used to combat. High amounts, never run out. E. Magic Supplies: I. All staffs: Battle staffs, mud staff, ancient staff. II. All mage robes, from normal magic robes to infinity to bark. III. All runes that are used for any combat spells. High amounts, never run out. [/code]
[code=Edit Log] Format:
Name: Date: What you did [detailed]:
Example: Arham March 19th, 2012 Added new combat system
---
Arham March 21st, 2012 New source
Arham March 22nd, 2012 Added a cool new login message
Arham March 22nd, 2012 New ::players
Arham March 22nd, 2012 Better DDS spec
Arham March 22nd, 2012 Fixed shopping and allowing you to properly buy or sell items even with a full inventory if some checking matches
Arham March 22nd, 2012 Fixed a 85% chance of roll-backs [/code][/center]
Our goal is that we will have a server, that mainly focusses on PKing. We will stand out from others because we...
[ul][li]Don't have dumb higher revision things (we don't even have godswords).[/li] [li]One developer which prevents arguments[/li] [li]Focused on PKing[/li] [li]Are Delta[/li][/ul]
I hope alot of people support us and we need it. I honestly think ox random xi really didn't think too hard on this, as he make so simple features. By the time we are done, we will be the best PKing server (probably behind T.U.Pk.S :P).
[b]Pictures :D:[/b]
[URL=http://img196.imageshack.us/i/updatesmarch22nd20121.png/][IMG]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/451/updatesmarch22nd20121.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img252.imageshack.us/i/updatesmarch22nd20122.png/][IMG]http://img252.imageshack.us/img252/1757/updatesmarch22nd20122.png[/img][/URL]
http://youtu.be/uwhD-SDedws
[b]Aren't you working on T.U.Pk.S?[/b]
Luckily, ox random xi doesn't want me to stress with the server so he called me as a part-time server maker. I'm really glad at ox random xi that he actually had sympathy.
Thanks for reading.

item.title: [Delta]Xenophobia - Putting PK back to servers
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“g0d of war1, post:51, topic:436936”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=539651.msg3955284#msg3955284 date=1332696326]

[quote author=g0d of war1 link=topic=539651.msg3955270#msg3955270 date=1332695462]

Pking never left rsps…?

For me it has, all its about now is the new armor shit.
[/quote] The new armour is shit lol. The black armour looks like torva, bandos looks like someone shit on it. Rs is becoming legit garbage
every update they do.

the 700s officially destroyed Runescape. I’m going back to PKing before godswords.
[/quote] Please do, The best time of runescape was old school pking. Back then i was a range/str basically, range 2h I used iron chainbody, green d\hide chaps, and coif. The best pker I’ve ever saw was suffer.[/quote]
I gotta go with B E N N Y.

Read full topic
